Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM.synopsis: Avatar Lae'zel meets Daisy in person for the first time. Daisy will invite the player to kill them, knowing that Vlaakith has ordered the player to do so. The player will be able to ask Daisy about the astral prison, the Absolute, and why the gith are after them,
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM.how_to_trigger: As Lae'zel Avatar, go to act 1b. Go the security office and accept or refuse Vlaakith's mission. Insert the Artefact into the planecaster objectOnce in the astral prison, follow the wisp to its final destination and talk to it.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_2.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_2.text: My killer. So you are not to be trusted.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy reforms from astral ether on the spot where they were killed. The player is shocked to see Daisy alive. NodeContext: with an undercurrent of bitter disappointment

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_123.text: But perhaps you may yet be reasoned with.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_87.text: And you will learn to live with them.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_42.text: Though your judgement leaves much to be desired, your conviction, as ever, is strong.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_42.context: NodeContext: like a teacher disappointed by a naughty child whose behaviour they fully expected

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_74.text: I don't intend to make a habit of conversing with my killer, so I will be brief.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_62.text: Your survival depends on mine, and mine on yours. It's less than ideal, but it is where we stand.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_107.text: I know a secret that Vlaakith never wants to be revealed.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_1.text: It is the reason She mobilised Her people to retrieve the Astral Prism.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_67.text: It is why She sent you to kill me. And why She will kill you once you leave this place.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_94.text: Even now, the Inquisitor awaits your return, ready to strike.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_27.text: Even now, Vlaakith sends word to your people. They will stalk you to Toril's edge.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_82.text: Believe me or don't. The queen has already spoken.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_0.text: Now leave. I have a battle to return to.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_41.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_41.text: Wait, aren't you supposed to be dead?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_108.text: Do your actions have consequences? Yes. Most certainly. But not that one. Not here.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_43.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_43.text: Try to kill the figure again.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_136.text: I was mistaken. You are beyond reason.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_136.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy pulls out the blade. Blood spreads from the wound. They fade into wisps, and vanish into the astral ether.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_14.text: So you found a way in.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: On seeing us, Daisy stands up and turns to face us. With a gesture of the hand, invites us to come closer. NodeContext: Gently

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_103.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_103.text: Not that I ever dreamed I could stop you.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player walking up to Daisy.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_119.text: You were destined to come. Oh, dearest Lae'zel. Could a queen want for a more loyal servant?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_93.text: Few githyanki would deny their Queen's orders.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_50.text: Fewer still would change their mind.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_3.text: Then again, you always were special, Lae'zel.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_130.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_130.text: Vlaakith? My eternal Queen. Let the planes know Your glory.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_144.text: Such a pity. So great is your trust that you cling to mirages.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_110.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_110.text: I can see through your lies, creature. You are not Vlaakith.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_143.text: Well done, child. I am not Vlaakith. But I am your safety and your salvation.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_17.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_17.text: Vlakith, my Queen. I don't understand.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_99.text: Ah - your mind seeks answers. I feel it reaching, stretching, contorting. Yet still coming up short.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_56.text: I am not Vlaakith, child. But I am your safety and your salvation.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_10.text: Yet your queen wants you to kill me. I will not stand in your way.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_83.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_83.text: You are an agent of the Grand Design. Vlaakith told me so.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_11.text: Hm. Ever since the Astral Prism was stolen from Her oh-so-secret hiding place for it, She has become desperate. She lies.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_116.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_116.text: I may kill you yet. But first, I want answers.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_138.text: Of course. You've had doubts, Lae'zel. You may not have felt them - but I did, deep in your mind's shadows.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_101.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_101.text: Why does my queen want you dead?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_104.text: Vlaakith wants me dead because I know Her secret.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_112.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_112.text: How is it that you appear to me as my Queen?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_48.text: But unlike you, unlike anyone else in any plane, I know Vlaakith's secret.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_31.text: A prison. Commissioned by Vlaakith, built in the Hells. A place for all who threaten her to wilt and die.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_25.text: You see, I know Vlaakith's secret.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_70.text: A secret so great that if Her people ever found out, that would be the end of Her rule, the end of Her.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_33.text: A secret so important that She would preserve it at any cost - including sacrificing the very power that would stop the Grand Design - me.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_34.text: I can hear your thoughts. You think I'm lying. Vlaakith warned that I would try to deceive you. But consider this - what reason have I to deceive you? I want the same thing as you - freedom.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_73.text: And yet if you spare me, you make an enemy of Vlaakith. And you already have an enemy in the Absolute.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_102.text: So what will you do? Will you fulfil Vlaakith's orders? Or will you know the truth?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_60.text: The stuff of nightmares, and no concern of yours. It is enough that Vlaakith hunts me for my knowledge.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_36.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_36.text: Why did you stop the zaith'isk from removing my tadpole?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_137.text: You misunderstand. The zaith'isk was going to kill you. I couldn't let that happen.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_49.text: It is the very least of Queen Vlaakith's deceptions.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_7.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_7.text: You know more. What else can you tell me?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_64.text: A secret that I know, and Vlaakith doesn't.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_13.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_13.text: A beautiful lie. But a lie nonetheless.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_22.text: There's no lie. I would never lie to you.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_22.context: NodeContext: genuine - this isn't a lie

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_38.speaker: Narrator
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_38.text: *In spite of your reservations, they're telling the truth.*

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_131.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_131.text: Vlaakith has no intentions of letting you live, Lae'zel. And I have no intention of letting you die.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_100.text: Your people had no intention of letting you survive purification. And I had no intention of letting you die.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_84.text: And now that you know the truth, what will you do?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_134.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Daisy manifests a short sword in mid-air, and with a gesture, the hilt swivels towards the player, inviting them to take it.

Daisy kneels on the ground in front of the player.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_147.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_147.text: I'm not going to kill the one who's protecting me.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_21.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_21.text: Get up. You will not die today.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy stands up. Makes the sword vanish with a gesture of the hand.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_85.text: She will be furious. She fears nothing more than the loss of Her empire. The knowledge I have of Her deception will bring that about.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy gives a wry smile.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_4.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_4.text: You've been appearing to me as Vlaakith. How?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_118.text: A marvel of ancient magic. I was concerned only for your comfort.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_132.text: In truth, I am an adventurer from Baldur's Gate who was infected with an illithid tadpole and seeks to be free of the Absolute.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_9.text: The real Vlaakith is lying to you. You think She knows the secret mother Gith used to crush the mind flayer empire.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_90.text: But She does not. If the illithids would ever rise to power again, She would be incapable of stopping them.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_91.text: If Her deception were ever to come to light, Her impotence, Her rule would be over.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_32.text: But that very secret, which Vlaakith only pretends to know, is how I've been protecting you.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_80.text: I suppose She hoped to extract it from my corpse. How She intended to do that, I know not. It is a desperate act driven by fear.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_142.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_142.text: What's the secret to defeating the mind flayer empire then?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_95.text: Tell me - do you know the third axiom of the Maltbianblake incantation?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_23.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_23.text: Launch into a lengthy monologue using the biggest words you know.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_117.text: Impressive. You barely took a breath. And you didn't understand half of what you said. Your intellectual capacity is insufficient to know the truth.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_117.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy gives you a long stare, unimpressed. Then recovers before speaking.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_109.text: Honest. I like that. But my point is made - you wouldn't understand.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_47.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_47.text: It's a truth. The third truth. Of the Maltbianblake spell. Obviously.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_24.text: I think I may have overestimated your intelligence. You would simply not understand.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy gives you a long stare, unimpressed. Then recovers before speaking.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_44.text: All you need to know is that it is enough for Vlaakith to want me dead.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_127.text: You are trying to be clever. And failing. I'm sorry, but you just wouldn't understand.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_113.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_113.text: Let's get you out of here before she finds out I let you live.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_98.text: It's impossible. At least for now. The secret I carry is not only a threat to Vlaakith but also to the Absolute. And it is the latter I fear the most.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_40.text: This is the only place it cannot reach me.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_54.text: Out there, I would perish, and with my protection gone, you would become a mind flayer.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_126.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_126.text: In other words, with you alive She'll be after my neck.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_26.text: You will be marked for death, yes.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_79.text: But between Vlaakith and the Absolute, it is the Absolute I fear more. You would do well to think the same.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_30.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_30.text: This is all wrong. Queen Vlaakith would never lie to Her people.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_52.text: Denial is more potent than magic itself. And far harder to lift.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_55.text: Live with it, if you must. But if you wish to be free of the illithid threat, heed my instruction.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_35.text: And discover for yourself the true nature of your Queen.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_69.text: I have delayed long enough. The next attack is overdue, and I can't risk you being caught in the middle of it. I need you out there, searching for the Absolute.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_69.context: CinematicNodeContext: In the distance, sounds of battle (same as we heard in the first dream), darkening skies. A military order is given to attack. Daisy glances over their shoulder.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_81.text: I hope you are ready to face Vlaakith's wrath.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_125.text: Be warned. The Inquisitor awaits your return from this place with orders to kill you.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_88.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_88.text: Queen Vlaakith is a god. What could you possibly know that would bring Her down?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_66.text: Godlike in power, yes. But with none of the sanctity. A false god who lies to her own people.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_77.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_77.text: If you're such a threat to Her, why hasn't She killed you already?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_29.text: She is trying Her very best to kill me. By sending you.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_146.text: Queen Vlaakith is lying to you. You think She knows the secret mother Gith used to crush the mind flayer empire.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_128.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_128.text: Let's get you out of here, out of Vlaakith's grasp.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_65.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_65.text: You claim to know a lot about my Queen, and yet you present no evidence.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_114.text: You stood in Her presence yourself. Was it not enough to convince you of Her fear? Her desperation?

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_61.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_61.text: I will not shirk my duty.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player takes the blade and drives it through Daisy's chest. Daisy reacts with pain.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_12.text: Dear Lae'zel. I had hoped you'd see reason.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy is shocked. NodeContext: bitter

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_115.text: We could have been so much more. But you had to choose this.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy pulls out the blade. Blood spreads from the wound. They fade into wisps, and vanish into the astral ether. NodeContext: disappointed

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_37.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_37.text: Try to probe into the figure's mind.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_63.text: That was uncalled for. Though, a spell well cast.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_28.text: Must you? Really? If you were going to do it, at least you could have tried harder than that.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_19.text: I suppose I can't blame you. You are threatened by the tadpole and you think I prevented you from being cured.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_89.speaker: Narrator
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_89.text: *A palace of memories opens up to you, separated into segments. Within one segment, you see it - the truth, exactly as the figure said. They saved your life.*
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Just focus on player face as their mind is blown.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_135.speaker: Lae'zel
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_135.text: Then let it be done. Prepare for death.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_86.text: Go on then. If you must.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_18.text: You wasted no time, Lae'zel. No Queen could ask for a more faithful disciple.

Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_120.text: I suppose I can't blame you for trying.
Daisy_OM_Laezel_AOM_120.context: CinematicNodeContext: On seeing us, Daisy stands up and turns to face us. With a gesture of the hand, invites us to come closer. NodeContext: Gently
